'Telecom SudParis' (ex 'Telecom INT' [http://www.telecom-paristech.fr/telecom-paris/Actualites/TELECOM-
ParisTech.php Names changement] ) is a French state-funded Grande Ãcole for
engineers, accredited by the Commission des titres d'ingÃ©nieur. It produces
engineers with skills in information and communication science and technology,
and expertise in economic, social, and environmental fields. Telecom
SudParis shares its campus with Telecom Business School (ex INT Management), a
Graduate Business School, and has a research centre in the field of Information
and Communication Science and Technology (ICST). Telecom SudParis is part
of Institut Telecom, along with Telecom Business School, Telecom Paris, Telecom
Bretagne, TELECOM Lille 1 and the Eurecom Institute.

Telecom SudParis and Telecom Business School are part of Telecom & Management
SudParis (ex INT)
